𓊖 KAR

The central meanings of KUR were:
core ⇨ grain,heart,meat,center,cover⇨...
growth,height ⇨ mountain,hill,city,land⇨culture,court,work𓂓⇨...
circle ⇨ 𓊖𓐍𓇳⇨ ... 𓂻 gir ⇔ 𓇾TER > CER

Kor is without a doubt the most recognisable international name for cities, possibly even reaching to the biggest city on Earth in the Middle Ages:
អង្គរវត្ត Angkor Wat (Khmer: "Capital Temple") ⇔ 𓋹𓊖kur🌢.
